value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Best Practice Analyzer in Tabular Editor

value.title: Add or Edit Columns When Importing Data from Analysis Services into Power BI
value.excerpt: If you use SQL Server Analysis Services as a data source for Power BI, you have two types of connection; Live Connection or Import Data. value.title: Age Banding in Power BI Using TREATAS DAX Function   Relationship Based on Between
value.excerpt: One of the most common types of banding or binning is banding based on a range. Let's say, for example,  you want to have a group of customers based on their age group. The age group banding can be created in Power Query at the data transformation stage. It can be created using the Grouping and Binning

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. In this video, I am going to show you how easy is to calculate Age in Power BI using Power BI. This method is very useful

value.title: Aggregation and composite model: Microsoft Power BI fast and furious - THR3016
value.excerpt: The composite model enables you to have huge tables as a DirectQuery source, and some other smaller tables as in import mode. value.title: Aggregation to speed up the performance of a Power BI report even if all IMPORTED

value.excerpt: Banding (or binning or grouping) is a scenario that can be implemented both statically and dynamically in Power BI.
